cis350.games

Class chessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis350.games.chessPiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    chessBishop, chessKing, chessKnight, chessPawn, chessQueen, chessRook

    public abstract class chessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass Piece since all chess pieces have common variables and methods to execute. Defines a standard piece and it's features.
